definition: to take charge of/to manage/department (under a ministry)
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
Ministry of Justice (PRC etc)/Justice Department (USA etc)
Judicial Yuan, the high court under the constitution of Republic of China, then of Taiwan

sentences.english: The first chapter is the judicial judgments of traffic accident crime.
sentences.chinese: 第一章爲交通肇事罪的司法認定。

sentences.english: Article 3 The Macao Special Administrative Region shall be vested with independent judicial power, including that of final adjudication.
sentences.chinese: 第三條澳門特別行政區享有獨立的司法權和終審權。

sentences.english: At the same time, this fact fetter the trick of the judicial authority, indulge the criminal.
sentences.chinese: 同時也束縛了司法機關的手腳，造成寬縱罪犯的後果。

sentences.english: Any judicial officer who abuses his power and commits the crime mentioned in the preceding paragraph shall be given a heavier punishment.
sentences.chinese: 司法工作人員濫用職權，犯前款罪的，從重處罰。

sentences.english: The Justice Department says those dismissals were based on poor performance.
sentences.chinese: 司法部稱解僱是由於他們不良的工作表現。

sentences.english: The crime of bending the law for self-seeding is the judicial staff malfeasance of ceremony punishment…
sentences.chinese: 徇私枉法罪是典型的司法工作人員瀆職犯罪。

sentences.english: Article 6 Anyone who wants to obtain a qualification of lawyers shall pass the uniform national judicial examination.
sentences.chinese: 第六條取得律師資格應當經過國家統一的司法考試。

sentences.english: The plea agreement originated from a criminal jurisdiction system of US.
sentences.chinese: 辯訴交易是產生於美國的一項刑事司法制度。

sentences.english: If a crime is constituted, he shall be transferred to the department of justice and subject to criminal liabilities.
sentences.chinese: 構成犯罪的，依法移交司法機關追究其刑事責任。

sentences.english: Currently Guan is preparing for the National Bar exam.
sentences.chinese: 目前，管禮明正在準備國家司法考試。

sentences.english: People's procuratorates at all levels may install judicial police as needed.
sentences.chinese: 各級人民檢察院根據需要可以設司法警察。

sentences.english: Judicial accounting technology is a specialism means to investigate and prosecute economic crime case.
sentences.chinese: 司法會計技術是查辦經濟犯罪案件的專門手段。

sentences.english: Goodling no longer works at the department.
sentences.chinese: 古德林現已不在司法部工作。

sentences.english: By introducing a typical case this paper expounds the common reasons for disbanding a corporation compulsorily in judicial procedure.
sentences.chinese: 以典型案例作引子，闡明瞭公司司法解散的理由。

sentences.english: At last the litigants could easily interfere in cases, which hurts the fairness of justice.
sentences.chinese: 三是案件易受當事人不正當干預，影響司法公正。

sentences.english: This right does not obtain in judicial proceedings.
sentences.chinese: 該權利無法通過司法程序得到。

definition: rule of law/to rule by law
Ministry of Justice (PRC etc)/Justice Department (USA etc)
